scripts.deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pp-rwa/pp-rwa subgraph-local.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 pp-rwa-local subgraph-local.yaml --version-label v1.0.0
scripts.deploy-local:dev: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 pp-rwa-local subgraph-local.yaml --version-label dev
